Data: Bhuvneshwar to Warner, 1 run fullish on off, Warner closes the bat face to find a gap at midwicket
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run full on off, not overpitched. Finch nudges to square leg
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run finch backs away and Bhuvi follows him, inside edge down to fine leg

Bhuvneshwar to Warner, FOUR runs it'll go down as a drop but the ball has taken Bhuvneshwar's hands with it to the boundary. Fullish on off and middle, Warner powers a lofted drive back. Bhuvi gets a hand on it belatedly and the ball lobs up to the mid-on boundary. He seems to be writhing in pain
Bhuvneshwar to Warner, no run slightly wide outside off, Warner laces a cut to point
Bhuvneshwar to Warner, 1 run very close with a direct hit. Fullish delivery outside off, Warner plays it down to point. Jadeja collects cleanly and misses the non-striker's stumps.
Gurkeerat to Warner, no run very slow and tossed up on off, 77 kph. Warner watchfully defends
Gurkeerat to Warner, no run nicely bowled, tossed up again outside off. Warner comes down and drives back

Gurkeerat to Warner, FOUR runs oooh, just wide a of a diving short fine leg. Suddenly, the spinner creates a chance. Warner wants to take him on and goes for a sweep, connected but doesn't get required elevation. Beats him for four
Gurkeerat to Warner, no run defended back
Gurkeerat to Warner, 1 run nurdled to deep midwicket for a run
Gurkeerat to Finch, 1 run shortish delivery on off, Finch backs away and punches a drive to long-off with ease
R Dhawan to Finch, 1 run 122 kph, some inward movement to leg, Finch drives to mid-on for a run
R Dhawan to Warner, no run good stop there from the prowling Rahane at midwicket. Back of a length, Warner pulls
R Dhawan to Warner, no run 123 kph. Yorker on off, nudged to midwicket
R Dhawan to Warner, 1 run slower delivery outside off but ends up as a half-volley. Warner drills to wide mid-off
R Dhawan to Finch, 1 run 124 kph. Short and very wide. Finch reaches for it and cuts to deep point
R Dhawan to Warner, no run back of a length on leg, Warner misses his clip and is struck on the thigh pad
Gurkeerat to Finch, no run tossed up on middle, worked to square leg
Gurkeerat to Finch, 1 leg bye slightly shorter on leg. Finch plays it fine off his hips for one
Gurkeerat to Warner, 1 run flighted but short and wide, Warner crunches a cut to the sweeper cover
Gurkeerat to Finch, 1 run floated on off, Finch wants to go over the infield on the off side but can only outside-edge to third man

Gurkeerat to Warner, SIX runs slog swept for six to bring up Warner's fifty. Very good innings this. Gets down to a flighted delivery and nonchalantly lofts it over square leg. These are not small boundaries, but the ball clears with ease
Gurkeerat to Warner, no run tossed up on off and middle, blocked
R Dhawan to Finch, 1 run nudged to deep midwicket
R Dhawan to Warner, 1 run fullish delivery on leg, slower delivery. 121 kph. Drilled to long-on
R Dhawan to Finch, 1 run 128 kph. Full on off, pushed to long-on
R Dhawan to Warner, no run Warner backs away to a full delivery outside off, chopped to point
R Dhawan to Warner, no run on the bounce to midwicket. Shortish delivery on middle and Warner latches on the opportunity but finds the fielder
R Dhawan to Warner, no run full and wide outside off, driven to cover where Rohit makes a good diving stop. Two successive overs of three from Dhawan, nice stuff.
Gurkeerat to Finch, 1 run tossed up on middle, tucked to deep midwicket
Gurkeerat to Warner, FOUR runs slog swept for four on the bounce. Warner gets down early and lofts it easily over midwicket, on the bounce to the boundary.
Gurkeerat to Warner, no run defended off the front foot
Gurkeerat to Warner, 1 run tossed up yet again on off, drilled to long-off
Gurkeerat to Finch, FOUR runs finds the gap this time that he was looking for in the last over. Backs away, makes room for himself and lofts the ball with so much ease over cover.
Gurkeerat to Finch, no run shortish down leg, off Finch's pads towards fine leg
Jadeja to Warner, FOUR runs reverse swept for four. Easily done from Warner again. Makes it look so easy. Gets down early and plays it all along the ground past short third man
Jadeja to Warner, FOUR runs and another boundary. Makes himself some room and belts a drive to the cover boundary. Exceptionally easy for Warner.
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run drilled to long-on with the spin
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run tossed up on middle, pushed to long-on.
Jadeja to Warner, FOUR runs another boundary. Runs leaking here for India. Flat again outside off, Warner cuts and cuts fine past point.
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run overpitched on middle, pushed to long-on
R Dhawan to Warner, no run back of a length on off, Warner pulls to midwicket
R Dhawan to Warner, 1 wide very wide outside off, Warner tries his best to reach it but he can't. Wide
R Dhawan to Warner, 1 leg bye big appeal. Not given by umpire Wilson. Good length on leg, the ball skids on to hit Warner on the pads. Pitched outside leg and high
R Dhawan to Finch, no run full and tailing back in to hit Finch on the pads, sliding down leg
R Dhawan to Finch, no run turned to midwicket
R Dhawan to Finch, 1 run overly full outside off, skewed to the sweeper cover
R Dhawan to Warner, no run short and wide, cut straight to point
Jadeja to Finch, 2 runs a little bit of turn. Slowed up on middle, finch squirts a drive to third man. Finch rushes back for the second
Jadeja to Finch, no run full and straight, blocked
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run very well played. Similar delivery , tight on off. Finch opens the face of the bat to find a gap at cover
Jadeja to Warner, no run flat on off, pushed back
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run slightly slower down leg, Warner skips down to turn to short fine leg. Would have been close with a direct hit
Jadeja to Finch, no run flat and quick on off, defended
R Dhawan to Warner, 1 run played quietly into the off side for a quick run
R Dhawan to Finch, no run quick legcutter outside off, 125 kph. Finch taps to the bowler
R Dhawan to Finch, 2 runs slower delivery on middle and off, pushed down to long-on. They ease for the first run but Warner quickly scampers back for two. Excellent running
R Dhawan to Finch, 1 run back of a length outside off, punched to long-on
R Dhawan to Warner, 2 runs

R Dhawan to Warner, no run lands just in front of Rahane at cover this time. Short and wide, sat up for Warner to crunch. He smashes it in the air but landed on the bounce. Rahane seems to have done something to his hand as well
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run shortish outside off, punched to deep cover

Jadeja to Warner, 1 run wow, what was that? Warner got in shape very early for a switch hit but Jadeja saw it and improvised, fired a flat delivery down his leg side but Warner executes a fine late cut to fine leg/third man
Jadeja to Finch, no run defended off the front foot
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run
Jadeja to Warner, 1 wide and again, Warner backs away but Jadeja fires it down leg
Jadeja to Warner, no run driven back to Jadeja
Jadeja to Warner, no run flat on leg, Warner clips to midwicket who makes a good diving stop
R Dhawan to Finch, no run full and wide, finch misses an opportunity as he finds mid-off
R Dhawan to Finch, 1 run clipped to midwicket
R Dhawan to Warner, no run good delivery, 123 kph, back of a length on off, Warner can only play it back despite looking to go over the off side
R Dhawan to Warner, 2 runs very close with a direct hit. Warner dives full length but the fielder at mid-on misses. They get an overthrow as well. Fullish length outside off, driven to mid-off
R Dhawan to Warner, 1 run slow, short and wide. Dabbed to third man
R Dhawan to Finch, no run slower legcutter on middle and leg, tucked straight to midwicket
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run Warner advances down to drive to long-on with the spin
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run slowed up on middle, Finch pushes with the spin to long-off once again
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run very full and flat on leg, long-on is found with a drive
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run goes on the back foot to open the face and find the gap through cover for one to bring up his fifty
Jadeja to Warner, no run flat on off, Warner makes room but finds cover with a cut
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run flat on middle, Warner shimmies down to drive to long-on
R Dhawan to Warner, 1 run short and wide, chopped down to third man
R Dhawan to Finch, 1 run inside-edged down to third man after the ball skidded on to Finch's cut
R Dhawan to Warner, 1 run slower legcutter outside off, drilled to the sweeper cover
R Dhawan to Finch, 1 run slower delivery but down leg, Finch flicks to square leg
R Dhawan to Warner, no run good length outside off, flat-batted down to mid-off.
R Dhawan to Warner, 1 run back of a length outside off, dabbed to third man.Warner wanted two but was wisely sent back
Bhuvneshwar to Warner, no run good length on off, Warner makes room to drive on the up to cover
Bhuvneshwar to Warner, 1 run 132 kph. Driven to mid-off
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run good length outside off, a sixth-stump line. Pushed to cover from the crease
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run 137 kph. Fullish length, tailing back in to hit Finch on the pads high
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run tight again from Bhuvi. Length delivery on middle, tamlely patted to long-on
Bhuvneshwar to Warner, no run only two of the over. Good length on middle, tucked to midwicket.
R Dhawan to Finch, no run slower ball on leg, pushed to midwicket

R Dhawan to Finch, SIX runs smashed. Six. Big hit. Full delivery on off, Finch backs away and goes over the infield and clears the mid-off boundary easily. With mid-off inside, it was a rather safe shot
R Dhawan to Finch, 2 runs cut wide of point for a couple. A touch short but not a terrible delivery
R Dhawan to Finch, 1 run length on middle, worked to square leg
R Dhawan to Warner, 1 run goes for it this time. Fuller length on middle, Warner swipes the ball over midwicket. Ishant runs around from long-on and cuts it in
R Dhawan to Finch, 1 run Finch flays a cut to deep point
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run back of a length on off, tucked to midwicket
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 2 runs good length and straight, Finch flicks nicely past midwicket for a couple of runs.
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, FOUR runs easily tickled off his hips to the fine leg boundary. Finch stands tall and just utilizes the ill-directed delivery to earn some runs
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, SIX runs smashed for another six. Very full on middle, Finch just times his loft easily over midwicket. Used all his power
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, FOUR runs another boundary, runs coming all too freely suddenly. Shortish and wide, Finch cuts past point for four.
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run shortish outside off, chopped down to backward point
Sharma to Warner, 2 runs slower ball down leg, clipped to square leg for another easy brace. Warner quick as ever
Sharma to Warner, 1 run 123 kph. Full on middle, Warner drives to long-off
Sharma to Finch, 1 run 141 kph, good length outside off. Pushed to long-on for one.
Sharma to Warner, 1 run another slower offcutter, looks a concerted effort to do so. Pushed to long-on
Sharma to Finch, no run good length outside off, inside-edged onto his pads

Sharma to Finch, 2 runs amazing running. Ishant is not at all happy and lets out a grunt of discontent. Tucked past midwicket, and the pair rush back for two. Not much the fielder could have done actually.
Jadeja to Warner, no run flat on leg, turned to midwicket
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run swept powerfully to deep square leg
Jadeja to Finch, no run wider of the crease, flat on off. pushed to cover
Jadeja to Finch, no run flat again on off, punched off the back foot to cover
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run tucked to square leg for one. Looked like they were were interested in two
Jadeja to Warner, no run worked to fine leg. Very flat and quick down leg
Sharma to Finch, FOUR runs rubbish ball, a half-volley on the pads with fine leg in the circle, Finch stays in his crease and flicks wide of that fielder to the long leg boundary
Sharma to Finch, 1 wide he's lucky to get away with a wide there, it was full and down leg side, Finch tried to glance again but could not connect
Sharma to Finch, 1 run good length around off, dropped with soft hands close on the off side

Sharma to Warner, OUT bowled him! Warner mows across the line but the length is not short enough as the ball angles across him, he inside edges it on to middle stump. Finally some respite for India ... Warner returns to the team with an innings that has set Australia up for a huge score
Sharma to Marsh, no run a huge appeal for lbw as the ball angles in from a good length and hits the top of the pad, was a bit high and going down leg side
Sharma to Marsh, no run good length on off side, Marsh gets behind the line and defends with a straight bat
Sharma to Marsh, 1 run driven off the front foot through cover point for a single
Jadeja to Marsh, no run gets on the front foot to a straight ball on off and middle and defends
Jadeja to Marsh, no run stays back and cuts the ball to point
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run tossed up fuller on off stump from around the wicket, driven to mid off
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run pushed off the front foot through the covers for a single
Jadeja to Marsh, no run bowled flat and quick on middle stump, defended back to the bowler
Jadeja to Marsh, no run played back to the bowler again, that hurried him for time
Sharma to Finch, no run 138 kph, fullish on middle. Finch finds midwicket with his flick
Sharma to Finch, no run slower legcutter on off, patted defensively to midwicket
Sharma to Finch, 2 runs shortish and wide, Finch guides down to third man. Bhuvneshwar fumbles and allows the second.
Sharma to Finch, no run another straight legcutter and Finch finds midwicket yet again
Sharma to Finch, 1 run shouts of 'catch it' but the ball fell well short of short fine leg. Legcutter on the pad, finch flicks on the up
Sharma to Marsh, no run Marsh hustled for pace and movement. The ball sneaks through bat and hits him on the thigh pad as he tried to drive
Jadeja to Finch, no run flat on middle, worked to midwicket
Jadeja to Finch, no run very full and straight, finch defends off the front foot
Jadeja to Finch, 3 runs shot. Lovely deflection. Took it off the keeper's gloves to late cut to third man for three. Used Jadeja's pace
Jadeja to Marsh, no run flat and full outside off, pushed to short mid-off
Jadeja to Marsh, no run round-arm action on off, driven defensively
Jadeja to Marsh, no run flat on middle, pushed back to the bowler
Yadav to Finch, FOUR runs splendid batting. Finch rushes to 99. Shortish on middle and Finch pounces on the opportunity and nails the pull to the backward square leg boundary. Very good placement
Yadav to Finch, no run good length on off, steered to point. Marsh wanted one, Finch didn't

Yadav to Finch, 1 run and he gets there with a neat tuck off his hip towards midwicket for one. He raises his bat and jumps in joy, with some fist-pumping as well. He is pleased. Superb innings. How much can he make?
Yadav to Marsh, no run back of a length on off, pushed to cover
Yadav to Marsh, no run fullish on off, Marsh finds mid-on once again
Yadav to Marsh, no run short and wide, missed opportunity. Marsh finds cover with an ill-timed cut
Jadeja to Finch, no run flat on middle, Finch defends
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run flat on leg, Finch backs away, opens the face and guides to deep point
Jadeja to Marsh, no run round-arm action from wider of the crease, Marsh shimmies down and finds cover
Jadeja to Marsh, 2 runs finds a gap through cover this time with a neat drive. Long-on cleans up
Jadeja to Marsh, no run well bowled from Jadeja, sees Marsh coming down and fires it slower and wider. Marsh pushes it to short mid-off
Jadeja to Marsh, no run hit to cover. Another dot to Marsh
Yadav to Finch, FOUR runs four to begin. Short on middle, Finch powers a pull to the midwicket boundary. Easily done
Yadav to Finch, 1 run too short again on leg, Finch flicks but finds short fine leg
Yadav to Marsh, FOUR runs superb shot. Full outside off, Marsh goes over mid-off and clears it comfortably. Much needed boundary for his own confidence
Yadav to Marsh, no run good length on off and middle, pushed back
Yadav to Marsh, no run back of a length on a fifth-stump line. Pushed to cover.
Yadav to Marsh, 1 run back of a length on leg, tickled fine towards backward square leg
Jadeja to Marsh, no run sees Marsh coming again and fires it flat and wide, defended

Jadeja to Marsh, FOUR runs gets down early and smashes the slog sweep for four. On the bounce. Slightly tossed up on middle and that is all he needed to get under it and get the elevation over midwicket
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run hit out to deep cover
Jadeja to Finch, no run shortish on leg, Finch makes room and cuts to point

Jadeja to Finch, no run massive appeal, not given. Looked very close. Flat on middle, Finch goes to sweep but misses. Struck pretty much in front, but was that sliding down leg? Yes, adjudges the umpire.
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run cut to point for a quick run
Yadav to Finch, no run back of a length outside off, the ball climbs steeply and beats Finch's outside edge
Yadav to Finch, no run inside-edge onto the pad. Nice length
Yadav to Finch, 1 wide very short down leg. Wide

Yadav to Finch, OUT Ishant takes the catch from mid-on. Good length on off, Finch goes for the pull but the ball bounces and takes the outside half. The ball lobs up and Ishant runs around from mid-on, even as Kohli from midwicket was running back. Ishant keeps his eyes on the ball and hangs on comfortably. And then has a word with Kohli. Big wicket, nonetheless, and a very timely one
Yadav to Marsh, 1 run fullish outside off, driven past cover to mid-on for one
Yadav to Smith, no run 140 kph. Beaut. Pitches on a good length on off and deviates away to beat the outside edge of Smith
Yadav to Smith, no run overly full outside off, driven to cover
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run flat on off, whipped to long-on
Jadeja to Smith, no run flat on off, clipped to midwicket
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run lovely shot. Runs to the pitch, opens the face to drive to deep cover
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run fired in outside off, a drilled drive evades short mid-off for one
Jadeja to Smith, no run yikes, Smith falls over as he tries to sweep. Fired in wide outside off, Smith misses the sweep and is struck on the pad

Jadeja to Smith, FOUR runs oh no, poor way to end. A high full toss on middle and Smith puts it away with ease to the midwicket boundary. Easily done once again. Another needless boundary conceded by India.
R Dhawan to Marsh, no run legcutter down leg, tickled to midwicket
R Dhawan to Marsh, 1 run slower delivery on a good length on leg, whacked down to long-on

R Dhawan to Smith, FOUR runs nicely played. Very nice. Shortish delivery outside off but Smith walks across, and pulls it easily past short fine leg for a boundary. Makes it look so easy, the fine leg fielder just about reached there but the ball won
R Dhawan to Smith, no run worked to midwicket
R Dhawan to Smith, 3 runs another whip pats short fine leg. That was straighter but he used all his wrists to get that fine
R Dhawan to Marsh, no run slower delivery outside off, Marsh goes for a big heave-ho but misses completely

Bhuvneshwar to Smith, SIX runs six. Just clears the deep square leg fielder. Dhawan at the boundary was lurking and felt like he was in it but the ball lobbed over. Fuller length on middle and Smith just short arm-jabbed that with the wrists
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, 1 run shortish delivery on middle, worked to deep midwicket
Bhuvneshwar to Marsh, 1 run shortish outside off, swatted to long-off
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, 2 runs slower delivery on off, nurdled fine to fine leg for a quick couple. Runs starting to flow again
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, no run full on off, clipped to the sole fielder in the circle - midwicket
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, 1 leg bye full down leg, spoons up of either bat or glove into the leg side

R Dhawan to Smith, FOUR runs lovely shot again. Comes down to the pitch and whistles a drive to the long-on boundary. Umesh Yadav runs around and tries to keep it in, but his hands is in contact with the ball while also touching the boundary
R Dhawan to Smith, 1 run shortish delivery outside off, thrashed to deep cover
R Dhawan to Marsh, 1 run swatted away to deep midwicket
R Dhawan to Smith, 1 run tailing back in on off and middle, driven to long-on
R Dhawan to Marsh, 2 runs shortish outside off, muscularly powered to long-off. Just missed the bowler's leg as well
R Dhawan to Marsh, 2 runs low full toss, driven to long-off. Smith hustles back for the second. Really good running
Sharma to Smith, SIX runs massive. Just humongous. Right in the slot from Ishant, full outside off. Smith just launches the swipe way over midwicket. Went deep into the first tier. So easily done.
Sharma to Smith, 2 runs goes around the wicket, yorker outside off but Smith flicks this wide of square leg. Those wrists in action again
Sharma to Smith, 2 runs slower ball on middle and off, turned to fine leg for a couple more. Already 10 of the over
Sharma to Smith, no run full down leg, Smith goes for a conventional reverse sweep but misses. Ishant has a word with Smith. No wide
Sharma to Smith, 1 run shortish on off, worked fine again. Fine leg cleans up
Sharma to Marsh, FOUR runs what power. Jabbed to the midwicket boundary. Very full on off, Marsh just whips this with power to the boundary

Bhuvneshwar to Smith, SIX runs another awful delivery. Full toss on middle, Smith just needs to flick this and he does it with nonchalant ease to the square leg boundary, in fact over. Six free runs for Australia
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, 1 run worked into the off side for a quick run
Bhuvneshwar to Marsh, 2 runs splendid running again from Smith, swatted to deep midwicket but Smith hurries back for the second
Bhuvneshwar to Marsh, 2 runs good length on off, 127 kph. Flat-batted to long-off, two more runs.
Bhuvneshwar to Marsh, 1 leg bye back of a length down leg, hits Marsh on the stomach as he misses his pull
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, no run fullish length outside off, Smith walks across but cannot find any bat on his attempted flick
Yadav to Marsh, 1 run full and wide outside off, inside-edged to fine leg
Yadav to Smith, 1 run slower ball outside off, well-disguised. Smith shovels to fine leg

Yadav to Marsh, OUT slogged to long-on. Virat takes an easy catch running in.l Another slower delivery outside off, Marsh goes for the sweep but can only lob it up. The ball took the outside half the bat, and the bat turned in his hands which contributed to the lack of distance. Marsh's middling innings ends

Yadav to Smith, FOUR runs almost six. That is ridiculous. Not sure if he meant that though. Shortish delivery outside off, Smith looks to flat-bat it down the ground but the ball flies over point and lands just inside the boundary. What a fifty
Yadav to Smith, 1 run tickled very fine to square leg
Yadav to Maxwell, 1 run 107kph, slower delivery outside off, Cut out to point
Sharma to Maxwell, no run 142 kph. Back of a length on middle, Maxi can't find bat on his shot
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 wide drifts down leg, wide
Sharma to Maxwell, 2 runs full on leg, mis-timed to long-on but Smith hustles back for the second
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run slower one outside off, Maxi backs away, then shuffles across to swipe to deep midwicket

Sharma to Smith, OUT taken. Very good catch from Gurkeerat at fine leg. A nothing delivery on middle stump, Smith goes for the heave but gets a top edge which flies to fine leg. Goes very high in the air and hangs there for quite a while. Mann backtracks, comes forward, backtracks and takes it
Sharma to Maxwell, 2 runs 146 kph, pushed to long-on for a run
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run Maxwell backs away but Ishant follows him. Shovelled to deep midwicket
Yadav to Maxwell, 1 run 120 kph. Slower delivery outside off, chopped to cover
Yadav to Bailey, 2 runs full on leg, just a neat tuck past square leg for two runs
Yadav to Bailey, no run 140 kph, full and wide outside off. Bailey completely misses a lofted drive
Yadav to Bailey, 2 runs slow legcutter outside off, Bailey rasps a cut over point for two
Yadav to Bailey, 1 run another slower ball outside off, Bailey cuts wide of point for one
Yadav to Maxwell, 1 run Maxwell covers all his stumps, looking for a ramp but the ball is speared in the blockhole. Squeeze to midwicket
Sharma to Maxwell, FOUR runs
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 leg bye brilliantly executed yorker. Maxwell is struck on the boot and he hobbles to the other end.
Sharma to Bailey, 3 runs helped on its way to fine leg for three. Gurkeerat runs around and fumbles while diving, allowing the extra run
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run another yorker. Speared in. Maxwell jams it out to cover
Sharma to Bailey, 2 runs 146 kph again. Yorker which is smeared back over the stumps, two more as long-on mops up

Sharma to Bailey, OUT misses his length this time does Ishant but he gets a wicket. Full on middle, Bailey smashes it high in the air towards long-on, Rohit runs around and takes a good catch. Great over this, but 11 still come off it.

Yadav to Faulkner, OUT 'Finisher Faulkner' goes for a golden globe. Nice slower delivery on middle, Faulkner gets down to try and sweep but the ball keeps a touch low and sneaks through to rattle into the stumps.
Yadav to Wade, 2 leg byes down leg, pings off Wade's pads towards fine leg. Wade scampers back for the second. Makes it with a full-length dive. Out with a direct hit

Yadav to Wade, OUT gone. Wade is run out this time. Slower delivery outside off, played towards point. Maxi calls Wade through. Wade is a little slow to get off and pays for it with his wicket. Rohit returns the throw on the bounce, and Yadav backtracks to the wicket to take the bails off. Good work
Yadav to Maxwell, FOUR runs lovely shot. That will be four. Full yorker on middle, Maxi moves across and ramps it over fine leg for four. Good connection, excellent execution
Yadav to Maxwell, FOUR runs another boundary. Slower ball outside off, full toss. He gets down on one knee and sweeps it over square leg
Yadav to Maxwell, 1 run low full toss on off, pushed to cover

Sharma to Maxwell, SIX runs bad ball. Very poor stuff. Short on Maxwell's hips and he just helps it on its way over fine leg. He did not have to work much for those six runs. Ishant misses his length badly and pays for it

Sharma to Maxwell, FOUR runs oh man. What a sensational shot that is. Full outside off, tailing back in. Maxwell gets down, watches thew ball and helps the ball over short third man with a deft reverse lap. Beautifully done.
Sharma to Maxwell, FOUR runs four more. Full on off, Maxwell backs away and laces a drive over cover this time. Another boundary
Sharma to Maxwell, no run slower delivery down leg. Maxwell misses his heave
Sharma to Maxwell, FOUR runs picked his shot and executed really well. Backed away just a touch and mis-timed the lofted drive over mid-off. Did not get all of it

Sharma to Maxwell, OUT what a catch from Pandey to finish. Just a sensational catch. Length on middle, Maxi pulls but doesn't get all if it again, his feet is parallel to the ground as he flies for the take. Great grab. But Maxwell has played a blinder

5.55pm Australia will be pleased with that performance. The openers set the tone from the start with a brisk stand. Warner, coming back after the birth of his second child, made a really good 93. Aaron Finch though carried on to make a ton. The innings stalled temporarily with his dismissal but Steven Smith and Glenn Maxwell played enterprising cameos to lift Australia to 348. India did not have many answers to that onslaught with the
In comes Virat Kohli
Hastings to S Dhawan, 1 wide drifts down leg, wide
Hastings to S Dhawan, no run back of a length on off, Dhawan defends off the front foot
Hastings to S Dhawan, FOUR runs Hastings is a bit too straight at the moment. Dhawan just flicks this past square leg for another boundary.
Hastings to S Dhawan, no run good length outside off, guided to point
Hastings to S Dhawan, no run 138 kph, full and straight. Pushed to mid-on
Hastings to S Dhawan, no run fullish on middle, played to midwicket. An unnecessary throw is well backed up by Maxwell
Hastings to S Dhawan, no run quite a good end that. Top-of-off line and length, defended

Faulkner to Kohli, FOUR runs what a shot to start from Kohli. Full and wide from Faulkner, Kohli just times his square drive past point for a boundary. That is his first ball and he generates such superlative timing
Faulkner to Kohli, no run full outside off, driven to mid-off
Faulkner to Kohli, no run better from Faulkner. Full on off, Kohli defends watchfully, under his eyes
Faulkner to Kohli, FOUR runs four more runs. Shimmies down the track and cuts past point for another boundary. Kohli, now, making it look all too easy
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run pushed towards cover for a run. Nicely played
Faulkner to S Dhawan, 1 run and again, Dhawan needs to just help one off his hips to deep midwicket

Hastings to S Dhawan, SIX runs wow. What was that. Dhawan at his very confident best. Shortish outside off, Dhawan runs down and swats the ball over point, both feet off the ground while playing the stroke, and that is six. Unbelievable stuff.
Hastings to S Dhawan, no run shortish again, cut to point
Hastings to S Dhawan, 1 run tucked to deep midwicket
Hastings to Kohli, no run 139 kph, length delivery outside off. A mis-timed drive to cover
Hastings to Kohli, no run back of a length on off, Kohli stays back and blocks under his eyes
Hastings to Kohli, 1 run a neat dab to third man for one
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run just wide of Faulkner. Good length on off, hit a tad on the up to mid-off
Faulkner to S Dhawan, 1 run nicely directed bouncer on Dhawan's badge, pulled away to fine leg
Faulkner to Kohli, no run fuller length on off, steered to point from the back foot
Faulkner to Kohli, FOUR runs flies to the boundary. Shortish delivery outside off, a tad too wide, enough for Kohli to throw his hands at it and finds the gap past cover.
Faulkner to Kohli, FOUR runs once more. Faulkner bowls a length delivery outside off, Kohli shimmies down and lofts it easily over cover for four.l
Faulkner to Kohli, no run full on off, defended
Lyon to S Dhawan, 1 run short and a bit too wide, cut out to the sweeper cover
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run skips down the track to flick to long-on with use of those wrists
Lyon to S Dhawan, 1 run some more flight outside off, driven to the sweeper cover
Lyon to Kohli, FOUR runs he goes inside-out this time. Making it look so easy. Comes closer to the pitch and lofts the ball over cover, against the spin
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run shortish down leg, clipped down to fine leg
Lyon to S Dhawan, no run straighter with a bit of loop, pushed back to the bowler
Marsh to Kohli, FOUR runs shortish delivery down leg, kisses the glove again but four for Kohli. Runs away to the fine leg fence.
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run fullish length outside off, pushed to the sweeper
Marsh to S Dhawan, no run full and tailing back in on off, worked to midwicket
Marsh to S Dhawan, 2 runs very full outside off, drilled to deep cover. Lyon misfields and fumbles to allow the second
Marsh to S Dhawan, no run full on middle, nurdled to midwicket
Marsh to S Dhawan, 1 run fullish ball outside off, a caressed drive to deep cover
Lyon to S Dhawan, 1 run slower through the air outside off, cut out to deep point
Lyon to Kohli, no run worked to midwicket with the spin
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run slightly slower on leg, Kohli comes down to clip to deep midwicket
Lyon to S Dhawan, no run good delivery. Slower but straight on off, defended
Lyon to S Dhawan, 1 run powerfully swept to backward square leg.
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run uses his feet to come closer to the pitch, and drive to long-on
Marsh to Kohli, no run 134 kph. What was that? Short delivery outside off, climbing steeply. Kohli wanted to pull but withdrew very late, the ball struck the face of the bat and went straight down
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run too short on middle, pulled to deep square leg
Marsh to S Dhawan, 1 run dabbed to third man

Marsh to Kohli, 2 runs oh, lucky for Kohli. Slower delivery down leg, a rather poor delivery. Kohli pulls but top-edges. The ball plonks in front of fine leg, Hastings does well to throw it back in while crossing over the boundary
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run played down with soft hands towards gully
Marsh to S Dhawan, no run tight end. Full on off, blocked
Maxwell to Kohli, 2 runs poor start. Drifts down leg. Nurdled very fine for a couple.
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 wide flat down leg. Wide
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run worked down to fine leg
Maxwell to S Dhawan, 1 run short and wide, thrashed to deep point
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run flat down leg, Kohli sweeps hard to fine leg
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run flatter on off, Dhawan squirts one towards midwicket

Maxwell to S Dhawan, FOUR runs not good bowling. Dragged down short outside off, Dhawan pounces on the pull and belts it away over midwicket for an easy boundary. Dhawan brings up a good fifty as well
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run slower delivery down leg, helped down to fine leg
Marsh to S Dhawan, no run slower delivery on off, pushed back to the bowler
Marsh to S Dhawan, 1 run short delivery down leg, Dhawan rockets a pull to deep square leg
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run 116 kph. Slower delivery on leg, pulled powerfully to deep midwicket
Marsh to S Dhawan, no run nice delivery. Slower on off, defended

Marsh to S Dhawan, FOUR runs another poor delivery, another boundary. Dhawan pulls past short fine leg for a boundary. Got on top of the bounce, but didn't keep it down. Was wide of the fielder anyway
Kane Richardson to Kohli, no run 128 kph. Back of a length on middle, worked to midwicket
Kane Richardson to Kohli, 2 runs did not quite get enough of it. Back of a length on middle, Kohli executes the pull over midwicket for a couple
Kane Richardson to Kohli, FOUR runs four more. Back of a length outside off, Kohli flays the cut in front of point for four more. Easy
Kane Richardson to Kohli, 2 runs fifty for Kohli now. Short delivery, Kohli rolls his wrists on it, keeps it down and finds the gap at backward square for a couple
Kane Richardson to Kohli, no run patted down to point
Kane Richardson to Kohli, 1 run 136 kph, picked off his hips to deep square leg
Marsh to Kohli, 2 runs too straight, just nudged past midwicket for two
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run whacked to deep square leg
Marsh to S Dhawan, 1 run excellent run that. Pushes a good delivery to mid-off for one. Very tight stuff but he made one out of that
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run swiped away to deep square leg, a touch short from Marsh
Marsh to S Dhawan, no run shortish delivery outside off, Dhawan shimmies down but chops to point
Marsh to S Dhawan, 1 run short again outside off, Dhawan creams a cut to the deep cover for a run
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, no run full delivery outside off, Dhawan tries to drive but inside-edges onto his pad
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, 2 runs fullish outside off, hit away past cover for a brace.
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, no run a touch short outside off, cut to deep point
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, no run very tight stuff from Richardson. On middle and a good length, Dhawan can only tap back
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, FOUR runs there is that boundary ball. Short on middle, Dhawan pulls powerfully in the gap at backward square leg for four. Made that look easy
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, FOUR runs and even better. Presents the full face of the bat to drive past mid-off for another boundary. Superb shot
Marsh to Kohli, 1 wide short of a length but the line is down leg side, Kohli tries to work it off his hips behind square but misses
Marsh to Kohli, no run gets behind the line of a straighter short of a length delivery and defends on the leg side
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run pushed from the crease to the right of the fielder at point for a single
Marsh to S Dhawan, 1 run uses the angle into him from around the wicket to tuck the ball off his pads through square leg
Marsh to Kohli, 1 wide strays down leg side again for the second wide in the over
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run a length ball outside off, punched through the covers for a single
Marsh to S Dhawan, 1 run steps out of his crease and drives a length ball on the up towards wide mid off

Marsh to Kohli, 1 run a risky single but the throw from mid on does not hit at the bowler's end! Kohli had pushed to the fielder and run, the man was closer in the circle, might have been tight had he hit
Faulkner to Kohli, 2 runs the slower ball outside off stump, Kohli drags it through the leg side with a swipe across the line
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run a fuller ball at faster pace outside off, Kohli drives off the front foot to deep cover
Faulkner to S Dhawan, 1 run steps out of his crease to get close to the ball and drives along he ground through cover
Faulkner to Kohli, no run played to mid off, they decide against the single
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run short of a length angling across the right-hander, Kohli stays back and guides the ball towards backward point
Faulkner to S Dhawan, 1 run short of a length angling into the left-hander, pulls behind square for another single
Smith to S Dhawan, no run legbreak on a decent length, spins into Dhawan from over the wicket, played back to the bowler
Smith to S Dhawan, 1 run closes the face of the bat too early on the front foot to play on the leg side but the leading edge falls safely short of cover
Smith to Kohli, FOUR runs a full ball driven powerfully off the front foot to the cover boundary, the fielder dives full stretch and at top speed but the ball wins
Smith to Kohli, no run a high full toss outside off, hit straight to the man at cover
Smith to Kohli, 1 run bowled flat and straight, punched off the back foot to long on
Smith to S Dhawan, no run steps out to drive but can't find the gap at cover

Faulkner to Kohli, SIX runs that is massive. What a huge six from Kohli. Comes down to the pitch and wallops the ball, deep over long-on. Has a look at Faulkner immediately. Wow, that is some hit, 103-metre hit
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run shortish delivery outside off, guided down to third man
Faulkner to S Dhawan, no run good change up. Short delivery after seeing Dhawan advancing, Dhawan pulls out of his shot
Faulkner to S Dhawan, 2 runs another shortish delivery outside off, Dhawan ramps the ball off the open face to third man. They get two
Faulkner to S Dhawan, no run good change up, nice slower ball outside off, The ball goes under Dhawan's bat
Faulkner to S Dhawan, 1 run another slower ball outside off, back-of-the-hand legcutter. Dhawan drives past cover for a run. Decent comeback in the over, but expensive
Smith to S Dhawan, no run oh nicely landed, fullish on off. Dhawan comes down but taps it back
Smith to S Dhawan, 1 run again, drags the length back seeing Dhawan advancing. Dhawan adjusts well too, pushes to mid-off for one
Smith to Kohli, 1 run shortish outside off, cut to deep point
Smith to S Dhawan, no run slowed up on off, defended
Smith to S Dhawan, FOUR runs rockets to the backward square boundary. Another four. Dhawan gets down early and smashes the sweep past short fine leg
Smith to S Dhawan, FOUR runs and that is another boundary. Tossed up, Dhawan runs down to smash the ball over mid-off. Runs leaking, and all too easily.
Lyon to Kohli, FOUR runs four more. Another boundary. Skips down the track and whips the ball past midwicket, long-on has no chance
Lyon to Kohli, no run goes down for the sweep and finds square leg
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run another exuberant swipe but this time he doesn't get all of it, inside-halves to deep midwicket
Lyon to S Dhawan, no run flat on off, pushed to cover
Lyon to S Dhawan, FOUR runs another boundary. Dhawan goes down early and executes the reverse sweep this time. In the gap and that'll be another four runs. Smith looking clueless
Lyon to S Dhawan, no run ooh, just short of mid-on. No real need for that shot. Comes to the pitch and drives on the up but lands in front of Hastings.
Hastings to Kohli, 2 runs lovely shot. Stands tall and punches a length delivery to deep cover off the back foot. The fielder does well to keep it in
Hastings to Kohli, 1 run crack. Short and wide, Kohli creams a cut to deep cover
Hastings to S Dhawan, 1 run easy run. Just pushes a full delivery to mid-on for one
Hastings to Kohli, no run full outside off, punched to cover
Hastings to Kohli, no run bowled from wider of the crease, on off. Kohli pushes to cover
Hastings to Kohli, 1 run guided down past point to third man
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run tossed up wider outside off, drilled to long-on
Lyon to S Dhawan, 1 run nicely bowled, nice run. Tapped towards point
Lyon to Kohli, FOUR runs another boundary. Got to the pitch and whipped a boundary past midwicket. Races to the long-on boundary
Lyon to Kohli, no run tossed up on off, defended
Lyon to Kohli, no run that is a bad ball. Short and wide, Kohli laces a cut to point
Lyon to Kohli, no run good comeback, flat on middle. Nurdled to square leg
Hastings to S Dhawan, no run fullish outside off, guided to point
Hastings to S Dhawan, 1 run advances and deflects it late to third man
Hastings to Kohli, 1 run uppish but safe. Good length outside off, Kohli looks to go over mid-off but the ball lobs up off the outside half to third man
Hastings to S Dhawan, no run nice bouncer. Well-directed. Dhawan sways out of the line
Hastings to S Dhawan, no run shortish length outside off, cut to point
Hastings to S Dhawan, 1 run 140 kph. Another short delivery outside off, pulled to deep square leg
Lyon to S Dhawan, 2 runs comes down to chip over the bowler's head for a couple. Nicely played
Lyon to S Dhawan, FOUR runs whew, that has flown to the square leg boundary. Tossed up on middle, Dhawan sweeps and sweeps hard to the fence
Lyon to S Dhawan, no run tossed up on off, defended

Lyon to S Dhawan, FOUR runs 100 for Dhawan. What an innings this has been. He raises his bat in trademark fashion. Fired in outside off, Dhawan guides the ball past point for four. Sensational innings from Shikhar
Lyon to S Dhawan, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, worked down to fine leg
Lyon to Kohli, no run slightly shorter on off, tickled to midwicket
Hastings to S Dhawan, 1 run length on off, Dhawan comes down to push in front of point for one
Hastings to Kohli, no run shortish outside off, the ball comes in a touch. Awkwardly hit to cover
Hastings to Kohli, no run fullish length coming back in, sliced to point. Kohli wanted one
Hastings to Kohli, 1 run short delivery on middle, pulled down to fine leg
Hastings to S Dhawan, 1 run a hard pull races to the deep square leg fielder
Hastings to Kohli, 1 run smashed away from the crease to deep cover
Marsh to Kohli, no run full outside off - fifth-stump line. Defended to cover
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run tucked fine to backward square leg, just the one

Marsh to S Dhawan, 1 run very good run that. Fullish outside off, Dhawan chops into the ground and Kohli calls him through. Wade fires at the non-strikers end and would have had the wicket with a direct hit
Marsh to Kohli, no run turned to midwicket
Marsh to Kohli, no run what a shot but he finds cover. Wow, that was creamed but he found the fielder. A tad too full
Marsh to Kohli, no run sensational shot again but he finds the fielder once more. Gets down on one bended knee and thrashes a drive but extra cover is in place
Hastings to S Dhawan, 1 run good delivery. Sees Dhawan advancing and digs it in short, Dhawan pulls to deep square leg
Hastings to Kohli, FOUR runs supreme. this time he finds the gap through extra cover and he gets four. Just a punch. Shortish delivery from hastings with too much room
Hastings to Kohli, 1 run carved down to third man
Hastings to S Dhawan, 1 run shortish on leg, pulled powerfully to fine leg
Hastings to Kohli, no run 118 kph, good length on off, guided to point
Hastings to Kohli, no run low full toss outside off, missed opportunity. Driven to mid-off
Marsh to S Dhawan, FOUR runs 113 kph, cross-batted swipe to the backward square leg boundary. A very bad ball though. Dhawan flicks this in the gap. Shot.
Marsh to S Dhawan, 2 runs full and wide, Dhawan goes for it and gets a thick outside edge which flies down to third man. Two more
Marsh to S Dhawan, no run fullish outside off, driven to mid-off

Marsh to S Dhawan, 1 run Bailey claims the catch. The umpires get together and they go up to the third umpire. The soft signal is not out. Short and wide, Dhawan laces a cut to point. It looks like the ball has bounced. That should be an easy decision. Dhawan pretty much knew as soon as he hit it.
Marsh to Kohli, no run 132 kph, fullish outside off, driven to cover
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run shortish delivery down leg, Kohli tucks to square leg for one to move to 99

Hastings to Kohli, 2 runs and he gets there with a brace. Comes down to loft the ball over extra cover to get to his second successive century. He has looked on the mark from his first ball. Great to watch, great innings
Hastings to Kohli, 2 runs guided past a diving point fielder for two more.
Hastings to Kohli, 1 run whipped over midwicket for a run
Hastings to S Dhawan, no run nice yorker on off, Dhawan backs away but finds point
Hastings to S Dhawan, no run another well-executed yorker on off, jammed to cover
Hastings to S Dhawan, 1 run squirts a drive to the sweeper cover. Nice over that. Kept it simple.
Marsh to S Dhawan, FOUR runs smashed over mid-off for four. Raced down to the pitch and got sufficiently under it to clear mid-off.
Marsh to S Dhawan, 1 run not timed at all. Slower delivery on middle, Dhawan comes down and swats the ball to long-on
Marsh to Kohli, no run good length outside off, driven to cover
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run low full toss on off, creamed to deep cover
Marsh to S Dhawan, 2 runs great fielding from Lyon at deep midwicket. Very full on middle, Dhawan swipes this in the air
Marsh to S Dhawan, 1 run nice drive. Crisp to mid-off. Just the one though as mid-off fields
Hastings to S Dhawan, (no ball) whoa, that slipped out. A very high full toss from Hastings. Dhawan tries to reverse sweep but cannot connect well enough
Hastings to S Dhawan, no run very full on middle, drilled to mid-off
Hastings to S Dhawan, 2 runs another good yorker. Smith, very sloppy while fielding, at mid-off allows the extra run after a misfield.
Hastings to Dhoni, no run full and wide, inside the tramline. Left alone
Hastings to Dhoni, no run back of a length, coming back in. Dhoni inside-halves down the pitch
Lyon to Kohli, no run flat outside off, blocked back
Lyon to Kohli, no run flat again, wide though. Kohli shimmies down but blocks back
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run turned to deep midwicket, nicely played
Lyon to Gurkeerat, no run tossed up on off, pushed back to the bowler
Lyon to Gurkeerat, no run angled wider. Gurkeerat drives to mid-off
Lyon to Gurkeerat, no run nudged to square leg off the pad
Kane Richardson to Jadeja, no run fullish on off, driven to cover
Kane Richardson to Jadeja, no run back of a length on off, defended off the back foot
Kane Richardson to Jadeja, 2 runs crashed through covers for a couple. Too wide from Richardson.
Kane Richardson to Jadeja, 1 run not a great delivery, length down leg. Worked to square leg for one
Kane Richardson to Gurkeerat, 1 run 136 kph, clipped off his pads to deep midwicket. One more. Successful over for Australia
Lyon to Gurkeerat, FOUR runs nice shot from Gurkeerat. Lofts the drive over mid-off, against the spin that too. Got under it enough to get the desired elevation.
Lyon to Jadeja, 2 runs flat on middle, nicely played to square leg with soft hands. Rushes back for the second. Good batting
Lyon to Jadeja, 1 run fullish on middle, driven to mid-on for a quick run
Lyon to Rahane, no run tossed up on off, blocked under his eyes
Lyon to Rahane, 2 runs comes down nicely, works it to square leg for another brace. Very well played. Another successful over for Australia
Kane Richardson to Jadeja, no run 130 kph, back of a length outside off, cracked to point
Kane Richardson to Jadeja, no run big appeal, pitched outside the line it appeared. Struck Jadeja right in front and a bit high, but that was always not out.

Kane Richardson to Jadeja, 2 runs oh, an overthrow now. Direct hit from Finch to the non-strikers end, the ball ricochets for an extra run. Hit to mid-off for a quick run. The umpire comes in Hastings' way in fact. All unintentional of course
Kane Richardson to Jadeja, 1 run steered to third man
Kane Richardson to R Dhawan, no run back of a length on Rishi's ribs, played to backward square leg. And another successful over for Aus.
Lyon to Jadeja, 1 run shortish outside off, cut to deep point
Lyon to R Dhawan, 1 run flat on off, Dhawan plays late to third man with an open face. One run
Lyon to Jadeja, 1 run good single there. Fullish on off, Jadeja plays it towards point for one
Lyon to R Dhawan, no run flatter trajectory but slow on middle. Defended
Lyon to R Dhawan, no run slowish on middle, defended again
Lyon to R Dhawan, 2 runs plays that very late, outside off and Dhawan plays it fine past third man for a couple. Nice stroke.
Kane Richardson to Jadeja, no run very good short bouncer. Well-directed. Jadeja is late on the pull and is beaten.
Kane Richardson to Jadeja, 2 runs another overthrow. Somewhat sloppy from Australia. Patted into the point region for a quick single, the throw misses the stumps and they get an extra
Kane Richardson to Jadeja, 1 run fullish and wide, crashed to the sweeper cover. Looking for two but they won't get it

Kane Richardson to R Dhawan, FOUR runs oh what a shot. Not sure what kind of field that is. Length delivery on off, Dhawan rushes down and flat-bats a shot past a very short mid-off for four. Superb execution
Kane Richardson to R Dhawan, 2 runs shortish again on off, Dhawan gets on top of his toes and pulls to deep midwicket for a couple
Faulkner to Bhuvneshwar, no run nice tight start. Length on off, played quietly to point

Faulkner to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run Wade drops one. Good length outside off, Bhuvi guides one off the face of the bat to Wade who spills it while diving. Burst out of the glove, but should have been taken. Big chance
Faulkner to Jadeja, no run good length, blocked
Faulkner to Jadeja, no run fullish on off. Jadeja pushes the ball to cover
Faulkner to Jadeja, 1 run chopped down to third man for a run
Faulkner to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run 133 kph, clipped to wide mid-on for a quick run. Just three of the over. Good for Australia but could have been a lot better
Kane Richardson to Bhuvneshwar, no run full outside off, Bhuvneshwar goes for an expansive drive, an adrenaline-driven shot. Beaten.
Kane Richardson to Bhuvneshwar, no run the ball climbs steeply now and swerves past Bhuvi's outside edge. Lovely length that, hitting those 'hard lengths'
Kane Richardson to Yadav, no run length delivery outside off, left alone
Kane Richardson to Yadav, no run what a massive heave-ho that was. Full delivery outside off, Yadav tries to hit it back to Melbourne. Misses completely.

Kane Richardson to Yadav, no run and another. Would be interesting to see if he connects well with these. Fullish outside off, Yadav goes for it with all his might again. No connection. Only a dot ball. Wicket maiden to end his spell
Faulkner to Jadeja, 1 run length on off, pushed towards cover for a run
Faulkner to Yadav, no run length delivery on leg, Yadav is hustled for pace and is struck on the pad high up
Faulkner to Yadav, no run this is not clever slogging from Yadav. Doesn't keep his shape, or his eyes on the ball. Just goes after an almighty swing. Missed
Faulkner to Yadav, no run length outside off, Yadav is beaten
Faulkner to Yadav, no run full on off, driven back to the bowler
Faulkner to Yadav, 1 run finally he gets bat on it, but all he will do is get one. Things just not happening for India. Slogged to deep midwicket
Marsh to Yadav, no run full and wide outside off, another slog. Another miss

Marsh to Yadav, 1 run Richardson drops a sitter. Should have been taken that. Full delivery and Yadav goes for another of his slogs. This one goes straight up. Richardson runs in from long-off and spills a relatively easy chance.
Marsh to Jadeja, 1 run another drop. Wade has spilled another chance. Short outside off, Jadeja goes for a the cut but gets a thick outside edge, Wade leaps up high and drops yet another
Marsh to Jadeja, 1 run fullish on off, played down to the keeper
Marsh to Sharma, no run full and wide, left alone. Six events in that over
Faulkner to Jadeja, no run full yorker outside off, smeared back
Faulkner to Jadeja, 1 wide very wide outside off. Wide this time
Faulkner to Jadeja, 2 runs nudged to long-on for two. Played that with soft hands and was able to get back. Good batting that.
Faulkner to Jadeja, FOUR runs wide yorker outside off, Jadeja gets some bat on his late deflection and the ball goes for four to third man
Faulkner to Jadeja, no run slower back of the hand legcutter outside off, Jadeja misses
Faulkner to Jadeja, no run another slower legcutter that bounces extra outside off, Jadeja cannot get bat on it again
Faulkner to Jadeja, no run another slower ball outside off, the legcutter spins away from Jadeja and he is beaten. Ishant comes down but is sent back.
Marsh to Sharma, no run full and wide outside off, Ishant beaten

10.10pm This has been some match. This has been some turnaround from Australia. Australia go 4-0 up and extend their home streak to 18 ODIs. But that will not be the story of the day. India were cruising the chase with such ease that it looked like Australia had almost given up before Dhawan had cut a ball to Bailey at point. Ever since, it was all Australia. India failed to win an over as they stumbled and staggered to an unbelievabl
Australia won by 25 runs
Player of the match is Kane Richardson, AUS
